text.name: input_MAP_OBJECT_HIDER_GUI
text.text: Open the Map Objects Hider panel

text.name: moh_gui_no_objects_text
text.text: No objects have been hidden until now

text.name: moh_delete_split_shape_dialog_text
text.text: Are you sure you want to remove this tree/log?

text.name: moh_hide_confirm_enabled_tooltip
text.text: Si mostrar un cuadro de diálogo de confirmación antes de ocultar un objeto (se sugiere dejarlo habilitado)

text.name: moh_sell_confirm_enabled_tooltip
text.text: Si mostrar un cuadro de diálogo de confirmación antes de vender un colocables

text.name: moh_split_shapes_confirm_enabled_tooltip
text.text: Whether to show a confirmation dialog before removing trees and logs

text.name: moh_gui_show_help_enabled_tooltip
text.text: Whether to show the buttons to open the hidden objects list in the help panel
